library(tidyverse)
library(babynames)
library(ggtext)

1.  **How popular am I?**

```{r exercise-1}
#load data
babydata <- read_csv("data/babynames.csv")

#visualize popularity of my name
babydata %>%
  filter(name == "Konrad") %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = year, y = n)) +
  geom_line(color = "deepskyblue") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(1910, 2020, by = 10)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_markdown(),
        plot.subtitle = element_textbox_simple()) +
  labs(title = "<span style = 'color:deepskyblue'>Number of Babies Named Konrad</span>",
       subtitle ="<span style = 'color:navy'>In the United States between 1913 and 2022</span>",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Number of Babies Named Konrad")
```
